articles.description: The new MacBook Pro 13 has arrived in our office. The new Ice Lake processor is pretty much identical to the predecessor in term of performance, only the integrated GPU is a bit faster. Is the switch to AMD long overdue?
articles.content: After Apple replaced the bigger MacBook Pro 15 with the MacBook Pro 16 (with some new features) in the end of last year, many users also hoped for a switch to a MacBook Pro 14 for the smaller model. … [+2454 chars]
